## ConnectEventsEmitter.onStreamEvent() method

Called by Connect.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onStreamEvent(resourceName: string, message: Message<MessageDetails.DataserverRequest>, stream: SocketObservable<any>, functions: StreamEventFunctions): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  resourceName | string | The name of the resource. |
|  message | [Message](./foundation-comms.message.md)&lt;[MessageDetails.DataserverRequest](./foundation-comms.messagedetails.dataserverrequest.md)&gt; | The message. |
